results.title: Simvastatin improves endothelial function in patents with subclinical hypothyroidism.

results.title: The effects of simvastatin and levothyroxine on intima-media thickness of the carotid artery in female normolipemic patients with subclinical hypothyroidism: a prospective, randomized-controlled study.
results.text_hl: The effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Thyroxine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013974 @@@levothyroxine@@@ on intima-media thickness of the carotid artery in female normolipemic @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Asymptomatic_Infections</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D058345 @@@subclinical hypothyroidism@@@: a prospective, randomized-controlled study.

results.title: In vivo and in vitro effects of statins on lymphocytes in patients with Hashimoto's thyroiditis.
results.text_hl: METHODS: In the first part of the study, 11 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Hashimoto_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D050031 @@@HT@@@ and subclinical @DISEASE_Hypothyroidism @DISEASE_MESH:D007037 @@@hypothyroidism@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Asymptomatic_Infections</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D058345 @@@SH@@@) were given @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ (20 mg/day) for 8 weeks.

citations.NLM: Gullu S, Emral R, Bastemir M, Parkes AB, Lazarus JH. In vivo and in vitro effects of statins on lymphocytes in patients with Hashimoto's thyroiditis. Eur J Endocrinol. 2005 Jul;153(1):41-8. PMID: 15994744
